TopicTitle: The Official Kerbin Cup Tournament Thread - Final Entries Posted

Articles.Content:
Any hints on whether Team Jedi has been selected?

noob jedi!!!! you asked wrong!!!

use the force!:

"Rowsdower, you want to tell me if Team Jedi was selected"

http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/11111/111114816/3536262-0272616095-jedi-.gif

noob jedi!!!! you asked wrong!!!

use the force!:

"Rowsdower, you want to tell me if Team Jedi was selected"

http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/11111/111114816/3536262-0272616095-jedi-.gif

It only works on the weak minded. Since he came up with this, Rowsdower is definitely not weak minded.
These are not the teams you are looking for!

These are not the teams you are looking for!

"Strong with these ones, the force is...."

Since, after all, Yoda bears a remarkable resemblance to a Kerbal....

Looks like I totally misunderstood things (again). So we're not voting, the mods are voting for us? Or is there a primary mod voting before we have an official vote?

Also, I'm in favor of this non-official challenge thing too, if it will work. I don't entirely understand the "mysterious nature" of the challenges. If each team gets a different challenge that they can't reveal, it will be hard for any non-official group to play along without having any idea of a challenge to do. But if it works, I will pledge rep too.
Please announce it before my bedtime, please...
I scrolled through the last page or so and didn't see any mention of this, so has anybody noticed a new file got posted for the Kerbin Cup DLC on Curse? Did something get changed? Should we update?

If need be, others would simply be taking on the challenges a week behind.

Edit: On inspection, the update includes a file ModuleBounce.cs, which I assume is the source code

Edited June 16, 2014 by cantab

I scrolled through the last page or so and didn't see any mention of this, so has anybody noticed a new file got posted for the Kerbin Cup DLC on Curse? Did something get changed? Should we update?

It was updated this morning to include the source code.

It already had the source code though... that's ModuleBounce.cs, right? Unless I mixed myself up, I've just checked both versions and both have that in there.

I guess you've answered my question about updating though

EDIT: Yep. I mixed things up. All makes sense now.
I've got one last fish to fry, then all will be revealed.

Is it a tasty fish. Phish sticks. Now I'm thinking about snacks.

Back on point great. Whoever gets in I just hope the forum wins.

I've got one last fish to fry, then all will be revealed.

oops

sorry about that....

Edited June 17, 2014 by Rainbowtrout
Removed reaction GIF

Whoever gets in I just hope the forum wins.

Agreed. Let's hope we don't scare the Reddit teams off this early in the game though, that'd be no fun.
Teams are up. Challenge is up. Congrats to everyone chosen and thank you for everyone who submitted names. Good luck and have fun!

Well... We're still gonna win the unofficial one *cheering from one guy in the corner*

EDIT: That's not a thing yet, is it.

EDITEDIT: I feel sorry for Jedi, it got announced after his bedtime:P And he even got in.

EDITx3: Yay! Jedi saw.

Edited June 17, 2014 by Spartwo

Alright, it looks like Team Hype Train didn't make it... but that's OK.

We still have a wonderful alliance of Forum Teams, and I think we have an EXCELLENT chance of beating the pants off Reddit.

Good luck to all!

Well... We're still gonna win the unofficial one *cheering from one guy in the corner*

EDIT: That's not a thing yet, is it.

Time to make a post in the Challenges subforum...

In any case, this is gonna be fun to watch.
Alright homies, we'll see one of you in the final.

Woot! Time to break it or break it!

Wait, I think I messed that up... ANYWAYS! I wish all the other teams good luck and great builds! *salute*

The first challenge is all about aesthetics and not a single member of the aesthetics crew is in the tournament? Jeez.

Congrats to all those who did make it in, you'd better make us proud!
I'm in! WHOOP-WHOOP! Good job team!
At the end of the day may the force be with us all!!

Well, time to name a ship the Darth Sidious and watch from the observation deck....

Good luck to all, and I hope an unofficial challenge pans out.

I'l be rootin' for ya'll. Reddit's got no chance.

Well, time to name a ship the Darth Sidious and watch from the observation deck....

Good luck to all, and I hope an unofficial challenge pans out.
